Replace.Text: MyGO special band unit, replaces rock bands, unlocks municipalities to "mass media". [ICON_Movement] More mobility.

MyGO special band unit, replaces rock bands, unlocks municipalities to "mass media". [ICON_Movement] More mobility. Must be purchased using the [ICON_Faith] faith value. After completing the "Cultural Hegemony" municipal government, you can choose any upgrade type. Rock concerts can be held in effective locations, with the same performance abilities as rock bands.
When killing a unit, you will get 20 points [ICON_GreatMusician] Big Musician Points

As the leader, Takamatsu Leng's MyGO specialty academy building was replaced by the library, but unlocked technology is "astrology". [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Extra +2 [ICON_Faith] Faith Output and +1 [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer Points. Provides 1 [ICON_GreatWork_Writing] book slot. When it was first completed, "astronomical navigation" and "astronomical" technology were immediately completed.

As the leader, Nagasaki Sakura's MyGO featured city center building, replacing granaries, and expensive. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Food] Food, +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture, +3 [ICON_Housing] Housing, but 1 [ICON_Gold] Gold Coin Maintenance. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] Accelerate urban development by 15%. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] Unlocking capability when first built (effective nationwide): Each built characteristic area in the city provides +1 [ICON_Food] food, +1 [ICON_Faith] ] Faith, +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture.

As the leader, Aiyin Chihaya's MyGO specialty industrial zone building was replaced by a factory, with a lower cost and no maintenance fee. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]All downtowns within 6 cells +3 [ICON_Production] Productivity, +2 [ICON_Gold] Coins, +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture, this bonus is only applied to the city once. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Unlock the "AnonTokyo Clothing Design" project for your city:[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]{LOC_PROJECT_ANONTOKYO_DESCRIPTION}

Shiina Riki's MyGO special improvement facility when he was the leader, "animal farming industry" was unlocked and cannot be built next to another panda garden. +1 [ICON_Culture] Cultural Value, +1 [ICON_Culture] Cultural Value after "Protecting the Earth". +1 [ICON_Culture] culture value per adjacent area. Various additional outputs are provided when adjacent to various buildings. +1 charm for adjacent cells. After studying "Flying" technology, press [ICON_Culture] cultural value to provide [ICON_Tourism] tourism performance. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] If adjacent to at least one shrine, +2 [ICON_Faith] Faith. [NEWLINE]If adjacent to at least one market, +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold. [NEWLINE]If adjacent to at least one university, +2 [ICON_Science] Tech value. [NEWLINE] +3 [ICON_Culture] Cultural Value if adjacent to at least one zoo. [NEWLINE]If adjacent to at least one ancient wood, +2 [ICON_Food] Food +2 [ICON_Faith] Faith. [NEWLINE] +2 [ICON_Production] Productivity +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold if adjacent to at least one shelter.

Shiina Riki's MyGO special improvement facility when he was the leader, "animal farming industry" was unlocked. It cannot be built next to another panda garden. +1 charm for adjacent cells. After studying "Flying" technology, press [ICON_Culture] cultural value to provide [ICON_Tourism] tourism performance. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] If adjacent to at least one shrine, +2 [ICON_Faith] Faith. [NEWLINE]If adjacent to at least one market, +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold. [NEWLINE]If adjacent to at least one university, +2 [ICON_Science] Tech value. [NEWLINE] +3 [ICON_Culture] Cultural Value if adjacent to at least one zoo. [NEWLINE]If adjacent to at least one ancient wood, +2 [ICON_Food] Food +2 [ICON_Faith] Faith. [NEWLINE] +2 [ICON_Production] Productivity +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold if adjacent to at least one shelter.

Featured items unlocked by the "Clothing Factory" building, offering a small amount of [ICON_Gold] gold coins per turn. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Each completion, all (including future built) commercial centers within the empire will permanently +1 [ICON_Culture] Cultural Value, +1 [ICON_Tourism] Tourism Performance Output.
Go forward even if you get lost
All units +1 [ICON_Movement] Movement force, all non-civilian units -1 field of view. All units +1 field of vision after having "Astronomy" technology.
The loading interface description of Gaosong lamp

After completing the "Writing" technology, +1 [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer Points per turn. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Stone and Marble Resource +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture Value. [NEWLINE] Allows the construction of quarries on any hilly landform. Quarry and mines that collect luxury resources +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith +1 [ICON_Culture] Cultural Value.

Entering the [ICON_GLORY_DARK_AGE] for the first time, you can get 2 spies and spy capacity for free. [NEWLINE]Enter the [ICON_GLORY_GOLDEN_AGE] Gold or Hero Age for the first time, and get 2 merchants and [ICON_TradeRoute] trade route capacity for free. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] In [ICON_GLORY_DARK_AGE] In the dark age, spy builds and offensive action time -50%, war-weariness gains -50%. [NEWLINE]In the era of gold or heroes, the starting city obtains [ICON_Culture] culture and [ICON_GOLD] gold coins +50% from the [ICON_TradeRoute] trade routes +50% from the civilization with [ICON_TradeRoute] trade routes [ICON_Tourism] Tourism performance.

When there is a team or civilization with a victory score higher than your own, all cities in Lixi will +10% [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] When a battle occurs, if there is a pioneer or builder in a nearby 1 grid, the unit [ICON_Strength] melee attack power +5.
+5 [ICON_Strength] combat power when there are your own pioneers or builders nearby.

Each [ICON_Envoy] messenger sent to the city-state provides +1 [ICON_Culture] cultural value to Aiyin. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Consulate buildings provide output of all types +1, and diplomatic buildings provide output of all types +2. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] Reconnaissance unit's [ICON_Movement] Movement Force +1.
The loading interface description of Lenai
The cat playing with the strings

Each [ICON_District] area (including the city center) offers +1 [ICON_GreatMusician] Big Musician Points. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] When the navy and land military units are adjacent to their own big musicians or rock bands +5 [ICON_Strength] combat power, +1 [ICON_Movement] mobility power. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Plantures built on topography other than permafrost and deserts -1 [ICON_FOOD] Food +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Cultural Value.
[ICON_Movement] for a big musician or rock band, +1 movement force bonus (cat tickling strings)
Then... can I form a band with me for the rest of my life?
In this case, I will end it.
I swear that if you are with the lamp, you will be fine for the rest of your life!
